name: No Light (itch) (Martyn)
description:
You are lost, deep in the French Catacombs with your friend, the two are desperately trying to escape. How will you survive?

Created in 9 hours, No Light was made for a student game jam. The requirements were that it needed to be a visual novel, have a theme of sacrifice and use Ren'py.

Credits

Martyn Evans - Creator

Assets

Visual Novel Assets by digienel, https://digienel.itch.io/visual-novel-assets
